Treasure Data, Mountain View, CA.

We are looking for a Growth Engineer to help grow our B2B SaaS business (15M Series B in Jan 2015)

You are:

- resourcefully relentless and relentlessly resourceful.

- a big believer in using programming to automate tedious tasks.

- technical but most interested in having direct business impact.

- not afraid of digging into the data to prove/disprove ideas.

We are rebuilding our growth strategy, and you will be a core member of this effort.

If interested, please email me at kiyoto@treasure-data.com with an example of an intelligent growth tactic you have implemented.
